name: Murch
cooked: Your analysis disregards that various parts of transactions do not have the same resource footprint in our system. I would suggest that you further explore the reasoning that led to the current state of affairs if you wish to convincingly motivate an intervention.
topic_title: [BUG]: spammers get Bitcoin blockspace at discounted price. Let's fix it
topic_html_title: [BUG]: spammers get Bitcoin blockspace at discounted price. Let’s fix it
raw: Your analysis disregards that various parts of transactions do not have the same resource footprint in our system. I would suggest that you further explore the reasoning that led to the current state of affairs if you wish to convincingly motivate an intervention.
